title: Tyrese and Ludacris Interview
itunes:title: Tyrese and Ludacris Interview
description:
Monday 4/10- Today on the show Tyrese and Ludacris stopped by to promote their latest movie " The Fate and the Furious". Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Ruby K . Coursey after killing her parapalegic boyfriend. Also, since it is Monday we helped a listener Shoot their Shot, but it did not go as intended.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
